data: Lord Albert | Mr. Foley | Lady Hamlet Vernon | Lady Ellersby

On the evening previous to Lord Albertâ€™s departure, while Mr. Foley and Lady Hamlet Vernon were intently engaged in playing at chess, Lord Albert announced to Lady Ellersby his intention of leaving Restormel, and paid her the usual compliment of thanks for the honour she had done him in inviting him there.
